base.desc:
dummy attack (22r)
radial-dart attack (1 damage, 5 pierce, 8 projectiles, 1 attack/2.1s, sharp type)
flies on a circular path with radius 80, or a figure 8 or figure infinite with radii 40
base.name: Rapid Fire

s13.desc:
flies 20% faster
gains moab-missile attack (25md, 1p, 3.0s, 2j, explosion type, homing, can only target blimps)
s13.name: Fighter Plane

s14.desc:
50%s (radial-dart 0.63, moab-missile 1.5)
radial-dart buffed: +4j (16)
all crosspath attacks are affected by the speed buff
s14.name: Operation: Dart Storm

s15.desc:
camo
radial-dart buffed: +2d (3), +3p (8), 50%s (0.315), +16j (32), normal type
moab-missile buffed: +125md (150), normal type
s15.name: Sky Shredder

s23.desc: pineapple replaced by bombing-run (3d, 40p, 1.7s, 4j, explosion type, can only be used above a path)
s23.name: Bomber Ace

s24.desc:
bombing-run buffed: +7d (10)
activated ability (45s cooldown): 700d to everything
s24.name: Ground Zero

s25.desc: activated ability (45s cooldown): 3000d to everything, with an 8.2s stun to anything that survives
s25.name: Tsar Bomba

s32.desc: gains centred path targetting (fly on a circular path in the centre of the screen with radius 90)
s32.name: Centered Path

s33.desc: homing darts that move faster
s33.name: Neva-Miss Targeting

s34.desc:
radial-dart replaced by dart (2d, 30p, 0.06s, ∞r, sharp type)
gains bomb attack (3d, 60p, 0.06s, ∞r, explosion type)
special crosspath handling: only 75%s from 1xx, and dart gets +25%p (37.5) from 2xx
s34.name: Spectre

s35.desc:
dart buffed: +2d (4), +2j (3), normal type
bomb buffed: +2d (5), +2j (3)normal type
the 3 projectiles of each attack have separate targeting (first, last, and close)
s35.name: Flying Fortress

base.desc: potion attack (1d, 15p, 2.0s, 45r, acid type, applies acid status (1d/2.0s, 4s duration))0
base.name: Alchemist

s12.desc:
gains acid-dip attack (10.0s, applies acidified buff, targets random towers in range other than alchemists, prioritising those not currently buffed)
acidified buff (+1cd, +1md, lead, lasts 10 shots, can stack by simply adding 10 more shots each time))
s12.name: Acidic Mixture Dip

s13.desc:
gains brew attack (8.0s, applies berserk buff, targets closest tower in range not currently buffed, except alchemists and towers that don't attack)
berserk buff (+1d, +2p, 90%s, +10%r, lasts 5.0s or 30 shots)
s13.name: Berserker Brew

s14.desc: berserk buffed: buff is now +1d, +3p, 85%s, +15%r, lasts 12.0s or 50 shots, can be reapplied after 5.0s
s14.name: Stronger Stimulant

s15.desc: acidified and berserk buffs are permanent (unless this alchemist is sold)
s15.name: Permanent Brew

s22.desc: potion buffed: +4md (5), removes fortified from bloons, or does an extra 15d to fortified blimps (20 total)
s22.name: Perishing Potions

s23.desc:
gains unstable-potion attack (3p, 6.0s, 65r, can only target blimps, applies unstable status
unstable status: when popped, creates an explosion (1%d, 10%md, 50p, blimps use 2p)
s23.name: Unstable Concoction

s24.desc: activated ability (60s cooldown): transforms into an attack monster with a beam attack (2d, 4p, 72r, 0.03s, plasma type) for 20s
s24.name: Transforming Tonic

s25.desc: activated ability (40s cooldown): also transforms 5 nearby towers (upgraded up to tier 3) into attack monsters with a beam attack (2d, 10p, 0.03s, 72r circle but actually 96r, plasma type) for 20s
s25.name: Total Transformation

s31.desc: potion buffed: can target path, leaving 5p puddles
s31.name: Acid Pool

s33.desc: potion buffed: applies golden-lead status (gives $50 when the lead layer is popped, unaffected by income cuts or cash modifiers)
s33.name: Lead to Gold

s34.desc:
gains gold-potion attack (15p, 5.0s, applies golden status (+2 cash modifier), which soaks through bloons but not blimps, and cannot affect a BAD at all)
note: this means that golden bloons give triple cash on their own, but the bonus stacks additively with other bonuses (like monkey town)
special crosspath handling: is affected by 1xx larger potions
s34.name: Rubber to Gold

s35.desc: gains red-potion attack (200p, 10.0s, ∞r, transforms target into a red bloon, MOABs use 20p, BFBs and DDTs use 50p, and ZOMGs use 100p, BADs cannot be targeted at all)
s35.name: Bloon Master Alchemist

base.desc:
dummy attack (22r)
radial-dart attack (1 damage, 5 pierce, 8 projectiles, 1 attack/2.1s, sharp type)
flies on a circular path with radius 80, or a figure 8 or figure infinite with radii 40
base.name: Rapid Fire

s14.desc:
spawns three planes that permanently fly around
planes have a dart attack (1d, 9p, 0.15s, 2j, sharp type)
planes also have a radial-dart attack (1d, 9p, 1.0s, 8j, sharp type, passive)
s14.name: Aircraft Carrier

s15.desc:
dart buffed: normal type
both plane attacks buffed: +1d (2), +5p (14), normal type
planes' dart attack now has only one projectile, but is aimed according to the main tower's targeting instead of straight forward
gains a buff: 85%s to all water towers (including self, which affects the planes)
s15.name: Carrier Flagship

s22.desc: grape buffed: fire type, applies a burn status (1d/1.5s, fire type, 3s duration)
s22.name: Hot Shot

s23.desc: gains cannonball attack (1d, 1.2s, impact, creates an explosion on hit (1d, 28p, explosion type), also emit frags on hit (1d, 8j, sharp type, impact))
s23.name: Cannon Ship

s24.desc: activated ability (60s cooldown): the strongest 'small' blimp (not ZOMG or BAD), immediately removing it and gaining the full amount of cash it would have given
s24.name: Monkey Pirates

s25.desc:
50%s
activated ability (30s cooldown): now has three hooks and gains double cash; can use two hooks at once to take down a ZOMG
s25.name: Pirate Lord

s33.desc: 200 end of round income
s33.name: Merchantman

s34.desc:
+300 end of round income (500)
gains a buff: +10% sellback price to anything in range (including self); this is stackable and additive, so 70% goes to 80% goes to 90% etc, but there is a hard cap on sellback prices at 95%
s34.name: Favored Trades

s35.desc:
+300 end of round income (800)
gains a buff: increases income of up to 20 xx3 or xx4 buccaneers by $20 for every buccaneer being buffed
s35.name: Trade Empire

base.desc:
bomb attack (1.5s, 40r, on hit: explosion)
explosion effect (1d, 18p, explosion type)
base.name: Bomb Shooter

s14.desc:
+1d (3), normal type
applies stun status for 1s, cannot affect blimps
s14.name: Bloon Impact

s15.desc:
+9d (12)
stun buffed: 2s duration, can affect blimps
s15.name: Bloon Crush

s24.desc: activated ability (30s cooldown): targets the strongest blimp: removes its top layer (up to 750d), and creates a (3d, 100p) explosion
s24.name: MOAB Assassin

s25.desc:
+64md (80), normal type
activated ability (10s cooldown): targets the strongest blimp: removes its top layer (up to 4500d), and creates a (3d, 100p) explosion
s25.name: MOAB Eliminator

s33.desc: frags replaced by clusters (1d, 10p, 8j, explosion type)
s33.name: Cluster Bombs

s34.desc:
every other shot replaces clusters with superclusters (same as cluster, but also creates a subcluster)
subcluster effect (1d, 60p, explosion type)
visually, subcluster shows 8 more explosions, but it is in fact just one large one
s34.name: Recursive Cluster

s35.desc:
normal type
every shot has a supercluster
passive ability (40s cooldown): when something leaks, destroys all bloons (including camo) and MOABs, and deals 2000 damage to all other blimps
s35.name: Bomb Blitz

base.desc:
boomerang attack (1d, 4p, 43r, 1.42s, sharp type)
boomerangs follow an anticlockwise arc instead of a straight line
base.name: Rapid Fire

s12.desc:
+5p (13), 85%s (1.207)
bug: combines additively with crosspaths instead of multiplicatively, ie 210 has 75%-15% = 60%s instead of 75%*85% = 63.75%, and 220 has 75%*75%-15% = 41.25%s
s12.name: Glaives

s13.desc:
boomerang replaced by glaive (1d, 50p, 1.2s, 43r, sharp type)
glaives jump to a nearby target after hitting
s13.name: Glaive Ricochet

s14.desc:
+50p (100), 50%s (0.6)
bug: 420 only has 80% the reload time that 410 does
s14.name: M.O.A.R Glaives

s15.desc: gains orbital-glaive attack (2d, 5cd (7), 5md (7), ∞, 0.1s, 40r zone, normal type, camo, cannot be buffed)
s15.name: Glaive Lord

s24.desc: activated ability (45s cooldown): +1d and 7× faster (0.04s) for 10s
s24.name: Turbo Charge

s25.desc:
+3d (4, 5md), 0.04s
activated ability (40s cooldown): +8d (12) for 15s
s25.name: Perma Charge

s33.desc:
boomerang replaced by kylie (2d, 18p, 1.42s, 49.5r, normal type, can rehit bloons after 0.3s)
kylies travel in a straight line before returning
s33.name: Kylie Boomerang

s34.desc: gains heavy-kylie attack (1d, 4md (5), 300p, 10.0s, normal type, can rehit after 0.1s, first 150 blimps get pushed back)
s34.name: MOAB Press

s35.desc:
kylie buffed: +10d (12), 50%s (0.71)
heavy-kylie buffed: +15md (20), 50%s (5.0s), 100r
s35.name: MOAB Domination

base.desc: dart attack (1d, 2p, 0.95s, 32r, sharp type)
base.name: Dart Monkey

s13.desc:
dart replaced by spikeball (1d, 1cd (2), 22p, 1.25s, sharp type)
spikeball can rebound off walls
s13.name: Spike-o-pult

s14.desc:
spikeball replaced by juggernaut (1d, 2cd (3), 100p, 36.5r, 1.0s, normal type)
juggernaut can rebound off walls
s14.name: Juggernaut

s15.desc:
juggernaut replaced by ultrajugg (4d, 8cd (12), 200p, 1.0s, normal type)
ultrajugg emits 6 juggernauts when there is 100p remaining and when it expires
if it expires before reaching 100p, then both sets of juggernauts are emitted together
s15.name: Ultra-Juggernaut

s24.desc:
75%s (0.475)
activated ability (50s cooldown): transforms 10 nearest dart monkeys (upgraded up to 242) into superfans for 15s
superfans have a dart attack (1d, 2p, 0.06s, 40r, sharp type), inheriting buffs to the transformed tower
s24.name: Super Monkey Fan Club

s25.desc:
activated ability (50s cooldown): transforms 20 nearest dart monkeys (upgraded up to 252) into plasmafans for 15s
plasmafans have a plasma attack (2d, 5p, 0.03s, 40r, plasma type), inheriting buffs to the transformed tower
s25.name: Plasma Monkey Fan Club

s33.desc: dart replaced by bolt (3d, 3p, 0.95s, 56r, sharp type)
s33.name: Crossbow

s34.desc:
+3d (6)
50d crit every 8-12 shots
s34.name: Sharp Shooter

s35.desc:
+20p (23), +20r (76), 25%s (0.2375), normal type
crit now occurs every 4-8 shots
s35.name: Crossbow Master

base.desc: thorn attack (1d, 1p, 1.1s, 35r, 5j, sharp type)
base.name: Druid

s13.desc: gains tornado attack (0d, 30p, 2.5s, pushes back bloons about 30-300 units)
s13.name: Druid of the Storm

s14.desc: gains lightball attack (6.0s, emits lightning (2d, 30p, 0.35s, plasma type))
s14.name: Ball Lightning

s15.desc:
camo
lightning buffed: +2d (3)
lightball lightning buffed: +3d (5)
gains superstorm attack (12d, 200p, 4.0s, MOABs use 20p, BFBs and DDTs use 50p, and ZOMGs use 200p)
s15.name: Superstorm

s23.desc: gains vine attack (1.4s, targets strongest bloon and spends (√rbe + 2 lead + 1)/4 seconds destroying it)note: in the above formula, rbe is the red bloon equivalent (the total health including children), and lead is simply 1 for lead bloons and 0 otherwise
s23.name: Druid of the Jungle

s24.desc: activated ability (40s cooldown): gains $200, plus $150 for every farm within 75 units (note that this range is affected by buffs)
s24.name: Jungle's Bounty

s25.desc:
+$1000 end of round income
vine buffed: 0.3s (but time to destroy bloons is unaffected)
gains brambles attack (2d, 4cd (6), 4md (6), ∞p, 0.5s, ∞r, sharp type, camo, cannot be buffed)
ability buffed: +25 lives
s25.name: Spirit of the Forest

s32.desc:
+x% speed, capped at +100%, where x is 10 plus the number of lives below the amount when this upgrade was purchased, ignoring any lives above the starting amount for the current mode
note that this is a buff to speed, NOT reload time (although it is of course still implemented with cooldowns internally)
s32.name: Heart of Vengeance

s33.desc:
+y% speed, capped at +100%, where y is half the amount of damage dealt by this druid since it was last idle for more than 2s
note again that this is a speed buff, and that it stacks multiplicatively with any buff gained from tier 2
s33.name: Druid of Wrath

s34.desc:
gains a buff: +15% speed to other druids in range, can stack (additively) up to 5 times total on any given druid
note that this is yet another speed buff, which also stacks multiplicatively with tiers 2 and 3
s34.name: Poplust

s35.desc:
+3d (4), 50%s (0.55), +5r (50)
+1d for every 3000 rbe on screen, capped at +30
s35.name: Avatar of Wrath

base.desc: nail attack (1d, 3p, 0.7s, 40r, sharp type)
base.name: Engineer Monkey

s11.desc:
gains build-sentry attack (10.0s, places a sentry on land)
sentry has a 25s lifetime, and a nail attack (1d, 1p, 0.95s, 45r, sharp type)
note: buffs to the engineer are inherited by its sentries, except alchemist buffs
note: sentries can also be buffed directly, except by alchemists, unless it is already inheriting the same buff
s11.name: Sentry Gun

s14.desc:
build-sentry buffed: places crushing-sentry, boom-sentry, cold-sentry, energy-sentry on a cycle, but sentries may be skipped depending on the bloons on screen
crushing-sentry has a spiked-ball attack (1d, 1cd (2), 22p, 1.25s, shatter type), skipped if there are leads (unless black and white are also present), but never skipped there are ceramics
boom-sentry has a bomb attack (1d, 30p, 1.5s, explosion type), skipped if there are blacks (unless white and lead are also present)f
cold-sentry has a ice-ball attack (1d, 15p, 1.5s, cold type, applies frozen status for 1.5s, applies permafrost status), skipped if there are whites (unless lead and black are also present)
energy-sentry has a laser attack (1d, 4p, 0.57s, energy type), skipped if there are leads (unless black and white are also present), and always skipped if there are purples
s14.name: Sentry Expert

s15.desc:
build-sentry buffed: places paragon-sentry
paragon-sentry has a plasma attack (2d, 3p, 0.06s, plasma type) and a selfdestruct attack (70d, 50p, plasma type, activates 2s after expiring)
s15.name: Sentry Paragon

s23.desc:
gains foam attack (2s, places foam (0d, 1 lead damage, 10p, normal type, 8.5s lifetime, decamo, degrow) on the track)
note: foam pierce is used even if a bloon does not have camo or regrow properties to remove
s23.name: Cleansing Foam

s24.desc:
activated ability (45s cooldown): doubles attack speed of chosen tower for the next 60s (if it cost less than 15k), or 45s (if it cost less than 40k), or 30s (otherwise)
this considers the amount spent on a tower, so is affected by difficulty and any discounts
farms can be overclocked: bananas have a reload like any other attack, it just happens to change according to the round length
villages can be overclocked even when not upgrade to 5xx: the buff applies to range instead, but half as much (ie 25% more range instead of 50% shorter reload)
s24.name: Overclock

s25.desc:
activated ability (45s cooldown): when overclock expires, the affected tower gains a permanent 5% reload buff, which stacks additively up to 10 times
this means that after the first ultraboost, the tower has a 95% reload multiplier, after the second it is replaced by 90%, and so on down to 50% (twice as fast)
in the case of villages, this is +2.5% to range, then 5%, etc, up to +50%r
s25.name: Ultraboost

s32.desc: nail buffed: applies pinned status on damage (0.95s duration, 100% slow, ceramic and higher are immune)
s32.name: Pin

s34.desc:
places a trap (500p) on the closest point of track in range, which pops any bloon (not blimps) up to its pierce limit with a +1 cash modifier, but stores this cash until the pierce is entirely used up
trap can capture camos, as long as the engineer had camo detection while placing it
trap must be collected (100r) to benefit from the extra cash, otherwise the yield is exactly what went in
another trap can be placed 2.9s after the previous one is collected, as long as the engineer has traps remaining (starts with 1, and gains another at the start of each round)
s34.name: Bloon Trap

s35.desc:
trap buffed: 10000p, can trap blimps other than BAD, and is no longer limited to one new trap per round
note: unlike Obyn's tree, the trap does not need to have more pierce than the RBE of a blimp in order to capture it
s35.name: XXXL Trap

base.desc: banana attack (40r, $80 income, split over 4 projectiles throughout the round, 15s lifetime)
base.name: Banana Farm

s14.desc: 5j, $1500 income
s14.name: Banana Research Facility

s15.desc:
+$4500 income ($6000)
gains a buff: +25% income to all 4xx farms (stacks multiplicatively with x2x valuable bananas)
s15.name: Banana Central

s23.desc:
+$150 income ($230), held in the bank instead of being emitted as bananas, to be collected at any time
bank's balance increases by 15% at the end of a round, up to a capacity of $7000
special crosspath handling: 031 has a flashing dollar sign when full, 032 autocollects if the balance was capped for the whole round
normal crosspath handling worth a clarification: top path upgrades each increase the total produced during the round by $40 as usual, and increase the number of installments by 2 as usual, ie it goes from 4*$57.5 to 6*$45 to 8*$38.75
s23.name: Monkey Bank

s24.desc:
+$3000 capacity ($10000)
activated ability (90s cooldown): loan $10k, to be repaid by taking 50% from any future income
note that only one loan will take repayments at a time, even if enough is gained at once to cover several existing loans
s24.name: IMF Loan

s25.desc: activated ability (60s cooldown): gain $10k
s25.name: Monkey-Nomics

s31.desc: bananas can be collected from further (about 50% more)
s31.name: EZ Collect

s32.desc: expired bananas give half their usual amount
s32.name: Banana Salvage

s33.desc:
+8j (12), +$160 income ($240)
bananas are immediately collected
s33.name: Marketplace

s34.desc:
+$900 end of round income
gains a buff: +10% end of round income to all xx3+ buccaneers, applied after the Trade Empire buff
s34.name: Central Market

s35.desc: +$4000 end of round income ($4900)
s35.name: Monkey Wall Street

base.desc:
glue attack (0d, 1p, 1.0s, 46r, acid type, applies glued status, cannot target blimps or anything already glued)
glued status (11s duration, 50% slow, 3 layers)
base.name: Glue gunner

s11.desc: glued status soaks through all layers (but still never through blimps, when able to target them)
s11.name: Glue Soak

s12.desc:
glued status buffed: 1d/2.3s
damaging glue can affect blimps, but the glue lasts half as long and doesn't slow
damaging glue can also affect targets that are already glued, as long as the existing glue is strictly weaker (meaning “less damage per second”)
s12.name: Corrosive Glue

s14.desc: glued status buffed: 1d/0.1s
s14.name: Bloon Liquefier

s15.desc:
12p, 25%s (0.25), impact
glued status buffed: 3cd/0.1s and 3md/0.1s
special crosspath handling (or maybe a bug): 520 has 16p not 17p
s15.name: The Bloon Solver

s24.desc:
activated ability (30s cooldown): glues all valid targets (according to the usual rules), including camo
glue from the ability will not overwrite glues with equal or greater damage, but it will refresh their duration
s24.name: Glue Strike

s25.desc: activated ability (30s cooldown): every 2s for the next 15s, applies weakening-glue (twice as slow as the usual glue, lasts twice as long, take +1d from attacks) to all valid targets
s25.name: Glue Storm

s33.desc: can now target blimps, but they are only slowed half as much as bloons (37.5%) and for half the duration (12s)
s33.name: MOAB Glue

s34.desc: glued bloons drop the glue when popped, to be picked up by the next target, lasts 5s
s34.name: Relentless Glue

s35.desc:
+50md (50), +5p (6)
glued status buffed: 1d/2.3s; 100% slow for bloons, MOABs, and DDTs; 95% for BFBs; and 90% for ZOMGs
special crosspath handling: 205 deals 1d/2.0ssuper glue can override any other glue, but this does not stop other glue overriding super glue according to the usual DPS rule (see 200 glue's desc)
s35.name: Super Glue

base.desc:
dummy attack (22r)
dart attack (1d, 3p, 40r, 0.56s, 2j, sharp type)
base.name: Heli Pilot

s12.desc: gains pursuit targetting (always flies towards a point slightly ahead of the first bloon)
s12.name: Pursuit

s14.desc:
gains machinegun attack (1d, 5p, 0.05s, sharp type)
gains rocket attack (2d, 40p, 1.0s, ∞r, 4j, explosion type)
s14.name: Apache Dartship

s15.desc:
dart buffed: +5d (6), +20p (23), normal type
machinegun buffed: +4d (5), +6p (11), plasma type
rocket buffed: +15md (17)
s15.name: Apache Prime

s23.desc: gains downdraft attack (0d, 1p, 0.1s, sends bloon 50-300 units back)
s23.name: Downdraft

s24.desc:
first activated ability (60s cooldown): move a tower, except for: aces, helis, farms, villages, aircraft carriers (4xx or 5xx buccaneers), and temples (4xx or 5xx supers)
second activated ability (60s cooldown): alternates between dropping $1000-$2000 and 50-75 lives
s24.name: Support Chinook

s25.desc:
second activated ability (60s cooldown): alternates between dropping $2000-$4000 and 100-150 lives
third activated ability (40s cooldown): deploy a marine (30s lifetime) with a bullet attack (6d, 30p, 0.05s, 50r, normal type)
crosspath note: the marine IS affected by xx1
s25.name: Special Poperations

s33.desc: gains shove attack (0d, 1p, pushes back MOABs, or holds BFBs in place, or slows DDTs or ZOMGs)
s33.name: MOAB Shove

s34.desc:
passive ability (25s cooldown): summons three comanches with a dart attack (2d, 3p, 0.3s, 40r, 3j, sharp type) and a rocket attack (1d, 2cd (3), 2md (3), 100p, 3.0s, ∞r, explosion type) for 10s when 2000rbe is on screen
crosspath note: mini comanches DO gain extra projectiles from 1xx, speed from x1x, and camo from x2x
s34.name: Comanche Defense

s35.desc:
+1d (including mini comanche attacks)
comanches are permanent
s35.name: Comanche Commander

base.desc: freeze attack (1d, 40p, 2.4s, 20r, cold type, applies frozen status for 1.5s)
base.name: Ice Monkey

s12.desc: can pop lead (but not necessarily frozen)
s12.name: Metal Freeze

s13.desc: frozen bloons emit shards (1d, 3p, 3j, shatter type) when hit
s13.name: Ice Shards

s14.desc:
+1d (2)
applies brittle status (take +1d, 2s duration)
s14.name: Embrittlement

s15.desc:
+3d (5), 90%s (2.16), normal type
brittle status buffed: take +4d, 3s duration
blimps can be targeted: they will take damage and receive brittle status, but cannot be frozen by this path
s15.name: Super Brittle

s22.desc: frozen status is now inherited by immediate children
s22.name: Deep Freeze

s23.desc:
+60p (100)
gains slow attack (cold type, 50% slow)
land towers are placeable on any water in range
s23.name: Arctic Wind

s24.desc:
+10r (30)
activated ability (60s cooldown): 1 damage to everything (non-white) on screen, including camo, blimps, and lead; applies frozen status to remaining bloons (this time including white) for 4s and to blimps for 2s (see 005 for how blimps are affected by freezing)
s24.name: Snowstorm

s25.desc:
+200p (300), +10r (40)
slowing effect is now 60%
activated ability (40s cooldown): 1 damage to everything on screen; applies frozen status to everything, including blimps, for 10s
s25.name: Absolute Zero

s33.desc:
replaces freeze with ice-bomb (1.0s, 46r, cold type, on hit: freeze)
freeze effect (1d, 30p, cold type, applies frozen status for 1.5s)
s33.name: Cryo Cannon

s34.desc: frozen bloons have icicles (1d, 3p, sharp type)
s34.name: Icicles

s35.desc:
75%s (0.75), +49md (50), shatter type
blimps can be targeted: frozen ZOMGSs are 50% slower, other frozen blimps move at ZOMGs' original speed (5 units per second)
s35.name: Icicle Impale

base.desc:
dummy attack (30r)
shell attack (2.2s, ∞r, creates an explosion effect (1d, 40p, explosion type, ~34 blast radius))
base.name: Mortar Monkey

s13.desc:
shell gains a second effect: shockwave (45p, explosion type, stuns bloons within a small radius for 0.5s, then deals 1d to anything in a larger radius that was not stunned)
note: since blimps cannot be stunned by this tower, they always take the 1d
s13.name: Shell Shock

s14.desc:
+40p (85), normal type
explosion buffed: +3d (5)
s14.name: The Big One

s15.desc:
+115p (200)
explosion buffed: +15d (20), +20cd (40), +20md (40), ~80 blast radius
shockwave buffed: +10cd (11) outside of the stun radius, ~120 blast radius
s15.name: The Biggest One

s23.desc: normal type, +1 lead damage (2), +3cd (4), +1md (2), additional +1d to anything fortified
s23.name: Heavy Shells

s25.desc: activated ability (60s cooldown): every second for the next 8 seconds, attacks everything on screen with 20d and a 1s stun
s25.name: Pop and Awe

s31.desc: less random variance in shell target
s31.name: Increased Accuracy

s32.desc: on-damage effect: apply burn status (1d/1.5s, fire type, 3s duration)
s32.name: Burny Stuff

s33.desc:
camo
on-damage effect: decamo (so black, zebra, and DDT are not affected)
s33.name: Signal Flare

s34.desc:
on-hit effect: decamo, but still only bloons not DDTs
on-hit effect: degrow
on-hit effect: defortify bloons or MOABs or BFBs (halves health of a fortified target (quarter for lead), rounding down, then removes the fortified property, then applies its usual damage)
s34.name: Shattering Shells

s35.desc:
normal type
burn status buffed: 5d/1s, 100md/1s
decamo and defortify effects can now affect DDTs
shell gains a firewall effect (1d, 20p, 0.1s, normal type)
crosspath note: firewall is affected by 1xx and 2xx
s35.name: Blooncineration

base.desc: shuriken attack (1d, 2p, 40r, 0.7s, sharp type, camo)
base.name: Ninja Monkey

s14.desc: shuriken buffed: +3j (5)
s14.name: Bloonjitsu

s15.desc:
+10r (57)
shuriken buffed: +1d (2), 0.217s, +3j (8)
bug: xx2 caltrops have 5p instead of 6
s15.name: Grandmaster Ninja

s21.desc: gains an on-damage effect: bloons have a 15% chance to be sent back about 10-250 units
s21.name: Distraction

s23.desc:
92%s and +8%p to all ninjas in range, any one ninja can be affected up to 20 times
the buff to reload is multiplicative (two shinobis bring the time down to 84.64%), while the pierce buff is additive (two shinobis grant +16%p)
s23.name: Shinobi Tactics

s24.desc: activated ability (60s cooldown): everything moves half speed for 15s; includes new spawns, unless dropped by a blimp
s24.name: Bloon Sabotage

s25.desc: activated ability (60s cooldown): for 30s, everything (again except children of blimps) moves half speed, and blimps entering the map have 25% less health
s25.name: Grand Saboteur

s32.desc: gains caltrop attack (1d, 6p, 4.4s, sharp type, targets path)
s32.name: Caltrops

s33.desc: gains flash-bomb attack (1d, 60p, normal type, thrown with every 4th shuriken, 1s stun)
s33.name: Flash Bomb

s34.desc: gains sticky-bomb attack (5.0s, can only target blimps, applies bombed status (removes layer up to 400d after 3s))
s34.name: Sticky Bomb

s35.desc:
flash-bomb buffed: +4d (5), stuns moabs for 0.25s
sticky-bomb buffed: ∞r, 40%s (2.0), bombed status deals up to 1000 damage, applies stun status for 1s
s35.name: Master Bomber

base.desc:
dummy attack (22r)
radial-dart attack (1 damage, 5 pierce, 8 projectiles, 1 attack/2.1s, sharp type)
flies on a circular path with radius 80, or a figure 8 or figure infinite with radii 40
base.name: Rapid Fire

s14.desc:
+12d (30, 45cd)
stuns blimps (MOABs 3s, BFBs 1.5s, ZOMGs and DDTs 0.75s)
s14.name: Maim MOAB

s15.desc:
+30d (60, 75cd)
stun lasts twice as long
applies crippled status (take +5d) with the same duration as stun, or 0.24s for BADs
s15.name: Cripple MOAB

s22.desc: emits shrapnel (1d, 2p, 8j, sharp type) if the shot fully pops its target
s22.name: Shrapnel Shot

s23.desc: +3p (4), ricochet behaviour (jumps to targets within about 55 units until the pierce runs out)
s23.name: Bouncing Bullet

s24.desc:
normal type
activated ability (60s cooldown): drops a crate worth $500-1000
s24.name: Supply Drop

s25.desc:
40%s (0.8s)
gains a buff (75%s, target: all other snipers)
provides elite targetting to all snipers (prioritises First if bloons are nearing the exit, then Ceramics if there are any, otherwise the strongest target)
activated ability (60s cooldown): drops a crate worth $1500-2500
s25.name: Elite Sniper

s34.desc: 50%s (0.13s), normal type
s34.name: Full Auto Rifle

s35.desc:
50%s (0.065s)
additionally shoots x% faster, where x% is how far along the track the furthest forward bloon is
passive ability (10s cooldown): shoots 4× faster for 7s after leaking
s35.name: Elite Defender

base.desc:
dummy attack (22r)
radial-dart attack (1 damage, 5 pierce, 8 projectiles, 1 attack/2.1s, sharp type)
flies on a circular path with radius 80, or a figure 8 or figure infinite with radii 40
base.name: Monkey Sub

s12.desc:
can target anything in the primary attack range of any tower, including camo detection
be aware that occasionally secondary attacks can see camo while the main one still can't (inferno ring, primary expertise, glaive lord, etc)
note also that spike factory does not have camo detection for the purposes of this upgrade
s12.name: Advanced Intel

s13.desc:
gains submerge targetting option
while submerged, dart is replaced with sonar (0d, ∞p, 1.75s, decamo)
s13.name: Submerge and Support

s14.name: Bloontonium Reactor

s15.desc:
radioactive buffed: 3d, 1000p
abilities of water towers in range have 50% cooldown time, all other abilities have 80% cooldown time
heroes in range gain +50% XP
s15.name: Energizer

s23.desc: gains missile attack (1d, 4cd (5), 4md (5), 100p, 1.5s, ∞r, explosion type)d
s23.name: Ballistic Missile

s24.desc: activated ability (60s cooldown): 10000 normal damage to strongest bloon, which can pierce blimp layers; additionally creates a (350d, ∞p, 75r, normal type) explosion
s24.name: First Strike Capability

s25.desc:
missile buffed: +6cd (11), +6md (11), 33.33%s (0.5s)
passive ability: sends an assassin (up to 750d) at any blimp that enters the map
s25.name: Pre-emptive Strike

s32.desc:
dart is now an impact projectile, emits airbursts on hit (1d, 2p, 3j, sharp type)
note that unlike most impact projectiles, the dart still has 1 damage not 0, and is therefore able to gain more from eg alchemist or support temple
note also that airbursts are able to hit the same target that the dart did
s32.name: Airburst Darts

s34.desc:
dart buffed: +1d (2), +2md (4)
airbursts buffed: +1md (2), +3p (5)
s34.name: Armor Piercing Darts

s35.desc:
50%s (0.125)
gains a buff (+1d, +5p, target: subs in range, including self)
s35.name: Sub Commander

base.desc: dart attack (1d, 1p, 0.06s, 50r, sharp type)
base.name: Super Monkey

s14.desc:
when upgraded, absorbs all towers in range for more power, to be detailed in a future command
dart replaced by sunblast (5d, 20p, 0.06s, 65r, normal type)
s14.name: Sun Temple

s15.desc:
when upgraded, absorbs all towers in range for even more power
+10d (15)
s15.name: True Sun God

s23.desc:
+4p (6), +1j
projectiles have opposite targeting (first/last or close/strong)
s23.name: Robo Monkey

s24.desc:
dart replaced by plasma (1d, 8p, 0.048s, 72r, 2j, plasma type)
activated ability (60s cooldown): 1000d, ∞p, 60r
s24.name: Tech Terror

s25.desc:
+4d (5), +5p (13), +10r (82), normal type
activated ability (60s cooldown): 3500d, ∞p, 100r
s25.name: The Anti-Bloon

s31.desc:
applies knockback status (~0.5s duration, 125% slow for regular bloons, 60% for leads and ceramics, and 30% for blimps, DDTs are unaffected)
note: 125% slow means move backwards at 25% speed
s31.name: Knockback

s33.desc:
dart replaced by monkeyrang (1d, 2md (3), 3p, 0.06s, 53r, sharp type)
knockback status buffed: 100% slow to leads and ceramics
s33.name: Dark Knight

s35.desc:
+3d (5, 8md), +15p (22), +4r (57)
passive ability (120s cooldown): when something leaks, delete it (no cash gain nor damage on the super monkey's counter), and anything else that leaks in the next 8s

base.desc: tacks attack (1d, 1p, 1.4s, 23r, 8j, sharp type)
base.name: Tack Shooter

s14.desc:
tacks replaced by firezone (3d, 60p, 0.535s, 23r zone, fire type)
special crosspath handling: xx1 gives +10p, xx2 gives a further +10p

s15.desc:
+1d (4), +6md (10), 0.1s, +11.5r (34.5)
gains meteor attack (700d, 1p, 4.0s, ∞r, fire type, camo, always targets strong)
s15.name: Inferno Ring

s23.desc: tacks replaced by blades (1d, 6p, 1.19s, 31r, sharp type)
s23.name: Blade Shooter

s24.desc: activated ability (20s cooldown): emits blades (1d, ∞p, 0.0333s, 2j, normal type) for 3s
s24.name: Blade Maelstrom

s25.desc:
+1d (2), normal type
activated ability (20s cooldown): emits blades (2d, ∞p, 0.0333s, 4j, normal type) for 9s
s25.name: Super Maelstrom

base.desc: buff attack (40r, targets anything except self, effect: +10%r)
base.name: Monkey Village

s13.desc: gains another primary-buff attack (targets primary towers, effect: +1p, +10%r, increased projectile speed)
s13.name: Primary training

s14.desc: primary-buff improved: free tier 1 upgrades
s14.name: Primary Mentoring

s15.desc:
primary-buff improved: +2p (so +3 overall), free tier 2 upgrades
gains catapult attack (10d, 190cd (200), 190md (200), 100p but blimps use 10, ∞r, 3.0s, normal type, camo)
note: the main attack is still the first set of buffs, not the catapult, so it does not have camo detection for the purpose of subs
s15.name: Primary Expertise

s21.desc: applies antigrow status to bloons in range (cannot regrow, ? duration)
s21.name: grow blocker

s23.desc: buff improved: grants normal type damage
s23.name: Monkey intelligence bureau

s24.desc: activated ability (60s cooldown): provides another buff for 10s (+50%p, 66.67%s)
s24.name: call to Arms

s25.desc: activated ability (60s cooldown): applies over an infinite range for 20s, and improved to (+100%p, 50%s)
s25.name: homeland defense

s31.desc: buff improved: +10% discount to base towers and upgrades up to tier 3
s31.name: Monkey Business

s32.desc:
buff improved: +5% discount to base towers and upgrades up to tier 3, stackable up to 3 times total
note: this means that the maximum discount from villages is (10+3*5)% = 25%, which stacks additively with support temples
s32.name: Monkey commerce

s33.desc: buff improved: +50% cash modifier (additive with other cash modifiers)
s33.name: Monkey Town

s34.desc:
+10r (50)
provides a free dart monkey at the end of each round
s34.name: Monkey city

s35.desc:
*actual cost is $5000 times the number of non-tier-5 farms in range, regardless of difficulty; these farms are sacrificed to the village when upgraded
income of $300 * floor(amount spent on sacrifices / 2000), divided throughout the round into at most 10 crates
**use !mp for monkeyopolis cost and profit calculator**
s35.name: Monkeyopolis

base.desc: bolt attack (1d, 2p, 40r, 1.1s, energy type)
base.name: Wizard Monkey

s15.desc:
bolt buffed: +2d (7), +6md (24), +4p (10), 50%s (0.1375)
gains flame attack (1d, 4p, 0.1s, fire type, applies burn status (1d/1.5s, fire type, 3s duration) on damage)
gains shimmer attack (0d, 200p, 90r, 2.5s, camo, decamo)
s15.name: Archmage

s21.desc:
gains fireball attack (1d, 3.0s, fire type, creates an explosion (1d, 15p, explosion type) on damage)
note: this means the explosion is able to damage purples, as long as the fireball hits something non-purple first to create the explosion
s21.name: Fireball

s22.desc:
gains firewall attack (5.5s, targets path, passive, creates a firewall)
firewall effect (1d, 20p, 20r, 0.1s, fire type, 4.5s duration)
special crosspath handling: firewall can be placed behind walls with 1xx
s22.name: Wall of Fire

s23.desc:
bolt replaced by flame (1d, 4p, 0.1s, fire type, applies burn status (1d/1.5s, fire type, 3s duration) on damage)
firewall buffed: 4.5s
s23.name: Dragon's Breath

s24.desc: activated ability (60s cooldown): summons a phoenix for 20s, who shoots flames (3d, 5p, 0.1s, camo)
s24.name: Summon Phoenix

s25.desc:
flame buffed: +46p (50)
summons the phoenix whenever the ability is not active
activated ability (50s cooldown): transforms into phoenix lord for 20s, who shoots flames (20d, 50p, 0.1s, normal type, camo) and meteors (50d, 500p, 1.0s, 8j, fire type, camo)
s25.name: Wizard Lord Phoenix

s33.desc: gains shimmer attack (0d, 200p, 2.5s, 70r, decamo)
s33.name: Shimmer

s34.desc: keeps track of up to 2000 pops (layers not damage) that occur within 80 units, and every 1.5s uses these pops to create up to 5 zombloons (1d, 2-11p, normal type, 8s lifetime), such that the total pierce is 10% more than the pops used
s34.name: Necromancer: Unpopped Army

s35.desc:
+40r (80)
bolt buffed: 25%s (0.275)
shimmer buffed: 50%s (1.25)
every second reanimation includes a zmoab (40d, 20p, normal type, 20s lifetime) if there are more than 5 stockpiled pops, or a zbfb (100d, 50p, normal type, 13.3s lifetime) if there are more than about 1450
gains a buff: +1d and +50% lifetime to all zombies from any wizard (including self)
s35.name: Prince of Darkness

base.desc:
spikes attack (1d, 5p, 2.2s, 34r, targets track, 70s or end of round lifespan)
note: spikes can hit camo, but the tower itself does not see camo as far as the sub is concerned
base.name: Spike Factory

s14.desc:
creates an explosion (10d, 2cd (12), 1fd, 40p, explosion type, applies burn status (1d/2s, 6s duration)) when spikes expire
note: explosion damage is doubled if the spikes timed out rather than pierce being used up
s14.name: Spiked Mines

s15.desc:
+9d (10, 13cd), 4.4s
explosion buffed: +990d (1000), +20p (60), normal type
s15.name: Super Mines

s24.desc: activated ability (40s cooldown): covers the track in spikes (1d, 4md (5), 5p)
s24.name: Spike Storm

s25.desc:
+1d (2, 6md)
ability buffed: +1d (2, 6md)
passive ability (20s cooldown): same as activated ability
s25.name: Carpet of Spikes

s32.desc: gains extra targetting options: close (closest point(s) in range), far (futhest point(s) in range), and smart (earliest point in range that bloons have not yet reached)
s32.name: Directed Spikes

s33.desc: 140s or end of 2 rounds lifespan
s33.name: Long Life Spikes

s35.desc:
+8d (10), +45p (50), 6.0s, 300s or end of 3 rounds lifespan
special crosspath handling: +20p from 105
s35.name: Perma-Spike
